text: Mint your own loan in the form of an algorithmic stablecoin (USDM), backed against your crypto collateral. Loans can be issued against a single asset or multiple assets. No capital gains tax.
Stake your LP tokens (MVK/XTZ, MVK/USDM, and USDM/XTZ) within yield farms and earn vMVK in return.
Deposit liquid assets in a decentralized exchange and earn rewards for helping to promote price stability. Or, stake your MVK, delegate your votes, and earn rewards for helping to secure the network.
Mavryk’s governance is completely controlled by the community through an on-chain DAO. Stake your MVK tokens and delegate to the Satellite of your choice, or run your own Satellite.
Operate a Satellite to play an active role in Mavryk’s governance and provide the platform with oracle pricing information. Get paid in vMVK and USDM.
Mavryk relies on Satellites to provide accurate and reliable pricing information, weighing the data with their respective stake in the system.
